Q4:-Identify the part of speech: 'She sings beautifully.' (Beautifully)
Q5:-Fill in the blank: 'We have lived here ____ five years.'
Q6:-Choose the correct passive voice: 'She writes a letter.'
options: A letter is written by her.
A letter was written by her.
questions.answer: A letter is written by her.

questions.question: Q7:-Convert into indirect speech: He said, "I will help you."
options: He said that he would help me.
He said that I would help him.
He says that he will help me.
He said he will help me.
questions.answer: He said that he would help me.

questions.question: Q8:-Choose the correct article: 'He is ____ honest man.'

Q10:-Choose the correct degree of comparison: 'Mount Everest is the ____ mountain in the world.'

Q14:-Identify the part of speech: 'Honesty is the best policy.' (Honesty)
Q15:-Fill in the blank: 'He succeeded ____ hard work.'
Q16:-Choose the correct passive voice: 'They are watching the movie.'
options: The movie is being watched by them.
The movie was watched by them.
The movie is watched by them.
The movie was being watched by them.
questions.answer: The movie is being watched by them.

questions.question: Q17:-Change into indirect speech: She said, "I am tired."
options: She said that she is tired.
She said that she was tired.
She says that she was tired.
She says that she is tired.
questions.answer: She said that she was tired.

questions.question: Q18:-Choose the correct article: 'He bought ____ umbrella.'

Q20:-Choose the correct degree of comparison: 'He is ____ than his brother.'
